Package org.vanted.animation.interpolators

Class SmoothCubicInterpolator

  • java.lang.Object
    • org.vanted.animation.interpolators.Interpolator
      • org.vanted.animation.interpolators.SmoothCubicInterpolator

  • public class SmoothCubicInterpolator
extends Interpolator
    Uses the same mathematical equation as a CubicInterpolator but with different constants. This provides a smoother interpolation and lessens the 'overshooting' effect that is apparent with the CubicInterpolator.
    Author:
    - Patrick Shaw

    • Method Detail

      • interpolate

        public double interpolate​(double t,
                          double... y)
        Description copied from class: Interpolator
        Override this method with an interpolation algorithm.
        Parameters:
        t - A value between 0 and 1. Typically represents how close you are to a given point with respect to time.
        t=0 Means the elapsed time value is equal to the time value of the previous data point.
        t=1 Means the elapsed time value is equal the time value of the next data point.
        y - The y values that you need interpolate between.
        Returns:
        An interpolated value.
